mess.name: Bratticus's Body
mess.description: Bratticus's unconscious body. It's more than a little grimy.

action.name: Clean
action.description: A few strips of duct tape and two flights of stairs later, Bratticus has been hidden safely in his room.

action.name: Clean
action.description: Assassin: I'm not touching him until I'm ready to move him. I'll need some way to keep him from moving if he wakes up and I need to make sure the path to his room is clear. I can't just shove Lord Borkus's child in some closet and I can't just magic him up the laundry chute. I'm an assassin, not a magician.
